events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product I got is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for money back on an incorrect item.
Customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong order item.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong product. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify and process your refund?
I have attached a photo of the wrong product and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know how soon the refund will be processed.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response and quick solution. I appreciate your help in sorting this out smoothly.
The refund has been processed and your case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
I confirmed the refund has been credited to my account. Thank you again for the excellent service.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
